decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be begun within 3 months and completed within 6 months of the date of this permission, otherwise this permission will lapse.

Reason: In the interests of the character and visual appearance of the property and surrounding area, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7B of the Development Management Plan (2013), and policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):  Design & Access + Planning Statement prepared by PB planning Consultancy Ltd dated Sep 2024; FP/TS/311 Arboricultural Report prepared by Parsons Tree Care dated 11.09.2024; 01 Site Plan & Location Plan; 02 Pre-Existing Block Plan; 03 Existing Block Plan; 04 (Rev A) Existing GA & Typical Reference Block Plan; 05 Proposed Block Plan
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| The eastern and southern elevation of the timber shed hereby approved shall be re-cladded with external brown feather edge timber cladding.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| The detached timber shed hereby approved shall be used only for storage purposes incidental to the flats on this site, and shall not be used for separate habitable accommodation, letting or any commercial use. No cooking or kitchen facilities shall be installed at any time. The timber shed shall be accessible to all residents within the building.

Reason: To ensure that the development does not detract from the amenity of the adjoining properties, and to enable the Local Planning Authority to retain control over the use of the building in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Development Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).

| Any planting that is part of the approved scheme that within a period of five years after planting is removed, dies or becomes seriously damaged or diseased, shall be replaced in the next planting season and all planting shall be replaced with others of a similar size and species and in the same position, unless the Local Planning Authority first gives written consent to any variation.

Reason: To improve the visual amenity of the property through urban greening and to ensure that the off-street parking does not prejudice pedestrian safety and in the interests of providing a sustainable environment for future occupiers of the development in accordance with policies 1.1 (f) (g) of the Development Strategy 2026 (2012); policies G7 of the London Plan (2021); The London Environment Strategy (2018); and policies 5.10, 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Retention of single storey detached timber shed to be used as storage and re-cladding the eastern and southern elevations with external brown feather edge timber cladding (Part-retrospective)
subdivision_of_building: The proposal relates to an outbuilding in the rear garden
